name: succulent plant pot coaster set
notes:
a plant pot that turns into coasters! the succulent plant pot coaster set by brunaticality.

a pdf is available from etsy for $5.15 https://www.etsy.com/listing/1445258021/succulent-plant-pot-coaster-set-crochet

what's included in the pdf file:
* coaster written pattern
* plant pot written pattern
* teapot coaster written pattern
* hanging basket written pattern
* coaster pattern chart
* plant pot pattern chart
* teapot pattern chart
* hanging pattern chart

a youtube video of [crochet succulent coasters and pot tutorial][1] is available.


  [1]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y97v4lbjyr4
